Verses: 1 isravelar Ellaarum Thangal Vamsa Varalaatrinpadi Ennappattaargal; Ivargal Naamangal Isravel Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu, Yoodhaa Koththiraththaar Thangal Dhrogaththinimiththam, Baabilonukku Siraipidiththukkondupogappattaargal.
2 thangal Kaaniyaatchiyilum Thangal Pattanangalilum Mun Kudiyirundhavargal Isravelarum Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Nidhineemiyarume.
3 yoodhaa Puththirarilum, Benyameen Puththirarilum, Eppiraayeem Manaase Enbavargalin Puththirarilum, Erusalemil Kudiyirundhavargal Yaarendraal,
4 yoodhaavin Puththiranaagiya Peresin Sandhadhiyil Paaniyin Kumaaranaagiya Imriyin Maganaana Umrikkup Pirandha Ammiyoodhin Kumaaran Ooththaai.
5 selaavin Sandhadhiyil Mooththavanaagiya Asaayaavum, Avan Pillaigalum,
6 seraavin Sandhadhiyil Yeguvelum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Arunootruththonnooruperume.
7 benyameen Puththiraril Asenoovaavin Kumaaranaagiya Odhaaviyaavukkup Pirandha Mesullaamin Magan Sallu.
8 erogaamin Kumaaran Ipneyaa; Mikkiriyin Kumaaranaagiya Oosiyin Magan Elaa; Ipniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Reguvelukkup Pirandha Sepadhiyaavin Magan Mesullaam Enbavargalum;
9 thangal Sandhadhigalinpadi Irundha Ivargal Sagodhararaagiya Tholaayiraththu Aimbaththaaruperume; Indha Manushar Ellaarum, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththile Pidhaakkalin Thalaivaraayirundhaargal.
10 aasaariyargalil Yedhaayaa, Yoyaarip, Yaagin.
11 agidhoopin Kumaaranaagiya Meraayodhin Magan Saadhokkukkup Pirandha Mesullaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ilkkiyaavin Magan Asariyaa Enbavan Dhevaalayaththu Visaaranaik Karththan.

12 malkiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paskoorukkup Pirandha Erogaamin Magan Adhaayaa; Immerin Kumaaranaagiya Mesillemiththin Magan Mesullaamukkup Pirandha Yaaseraavin Kumaaranaagiya Aadhiyelin Magan Maasaai Enbavargalum,
13 avargal Sagodhararum, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththalaivaraana Aayiraththuezhunootru Arubadhuper Dhevaalayaththukkaduththa Panividaikkuth Thiramaiyullavargalaayirundhaargal.
14 leviyaril Meraariyin Sandhadhiyaana Asabiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Asrigaamukkup Pirandha Asoopin Magan Semaayaa,
15 pakpakkaar, Eres, Kaalaal, Aasaabin Kumaaranaagiya Sikrikkup Pirandha Migaavin Magan Maththaniyaa,
16 edhuththoonin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalaalukkup Pirandha Semaayaavin Magan Opadhiyaa; Neththobaaththiyarin Graamangalil Kudiyirundha Elkkaanaavin Kumaaranaagiya Aasaavin Magan Peragiyaa,
17 vaasal Kaavalaaligalaagiya Salloom, Akkoop, Thalmon, Agimaan Enbavargalum, Ivargal Sagodhararume; Ivargal Thalaivan Salloom.
18 levipuththirarin Senaigalil Ivargal Kizhakkeyirukkira Raajaavin Vaasalaik Kaavalkaaththuvandhaargal

19 koraagin Kumaaranaagiya Ebiyaasaabukkup Pirandha Koreyin Magan Salloomum, Avan Pidhaavin Vamsaththaaraagiya Avanudaiya Sagodhararumaana Koraagiyar Panividaivelaiyai Visaariththu, Avargal Pidhaakkal Karththarudaiya Paalayaththile Vaasasthalaththirkuppogira Vazhiyaik Kaavalkaaththadhupola, Vaasasthalaththu Vaasalgalaik Kaaththuvandhaargal.
20 eleyaasaarin Kumaaranaagiya Pinegaasudane Karththar Irundhapadiyinaal, Avan Murkaalaththile Avargalmel Visaaranaikkaaranaayirundhaan.
21 meselmiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaa Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasal Kaavalkaaranaayirundhaan.

22 vaasalgalaik Kaakkiradharkuth Therindhukollappatta Ivargalellaarum Irunootrup Panniranduperaayirundhu, Thangal Graamangalinpadiye Thangal Vamsaththu Attavanaigalil Ezhudhappattaargal; Dhaaveedhum, Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Saamuvelum, Avargalaith Thangal Velaigalil Vaiththaargal.
23 appadiye Avargalum, Avargal Kumaararum Karththarudaiya Aalayamaagiya Vaasasthalaththu Vaasalgalaik Kaakkiravargalai Muraimuraiyaai Visaariththu Vandhaargal.
24 vaasalgalaik Kaakkiravargal Naaluthisaigalaagiya Kizhakkilum Merkilum Vadakkilum Therkilum Irundhaargal.
25 avargal Sagodharar Thangal Graamangalilirundhu, Ezhunaalukku Oruvisai Maarimaari Avargalodirukka Varuvaargal.
26 dhevaalayaththin Pandagasaalaigal Melum Pokkishasaalaigalmelumulla Visaaranai Uththiyogam Leviyaraana Andha Naalu Pradhaana Kaavalaalarvasaththil Oppuvikkappattadhu.
27 kaaval Avargalukku Oppuviththirundhapadiyaal Avargal Dhevaalayaththai Sutrilum Raaththangiyirundhu, Kaalame Kadhavugalaith Thirandhuviduvaargal.
28 avargalil Silaridaththil Aaraadhanai Panimuttugal Oppuviththirundhadhu; Avargal Avaigalai Enni Ulle Kondupoi, Enni Veliye Konduvaruvaargal.
29 avargalil Silar Matrap Panimuttugalin Parisuththa Paaththirangal Ellaavatrinmelum, Melliya Maa, Dhraatcharasam, Enney, Saambiraani, Sugandhavarkkangalinmelum Visaaranaikkaararaayirundhaargal.
30 aasaariyarin Kumaararil Silar Sugandhavarkkaththaal Parimalathailam Irakkuvaargal.
31 leviyaril Koraagiyanaana Salloomin Mooththa Kumaaranaagiya Maththiththiyaavukkup Palagaaram Sudugira Velaiyin Visaarippu Oppuviththirundhadhu.
32 avargal Sagodhararaagiya Kokaaththiyarin Puththiraril Silarukku Oivunaal Thorum Samugaththu Appangalai Aayaththappaduththum Visaarippu Irundhadhu.
33 ivargalil Leviyarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Thalaivaraagiya Sangeedhakkaarar Iravumpagalum Thangal Velaiyai Nadaththavendiyirundhapadiyaal, Matra Velaikku Neengalaaith Thangal Araigalil Irundhaargal.
34 leviyaril Pidhaakkalin Thalaivaraagiya Ivargal Thangal Sandhadhigalukkuth Thalaimaiyaanavargal; Ivargal Erusalemile Kudiyirundhaargal.
35 kibiyonile Kudiyirundhavargal Yaarendraal, Kibiyonin Mooppanaagiya Yegiyel, Ivan Penjaadhiyinper Maakkaal.
36 avan Mooththa Kumaaranaagiya Apthonum, Soor, Kees, Paagaal, Ner, Naadhaab,
37 kedhor, Agiyo, Sagariyaa, Miklodh Enbavargalume.
38 miklodh Seemiyaamaip Petraan; Ivargalum Thangal Sagodhararodunkooda Erusalemilirukkira Thangal Sagodhararukku Sameebaththil Kudiyirundhaargal.
39 ner Keesaip Petraan; Kees Savulaip Petraan; Savul Yonaththaanaiyum, Malkisoovaavaiyum, Abinadhaabaiyum, Espaalaiyum Petraan.
40 yonaththaanin Kumaaran Meribaal; Meribaal Meegaavaip Petraan.
41 meegaavin Kumaarar, Piththon, Melek, Thareyaa, Aagaas Enbavargal.
42 aagaas Yaaraagaip Petraan; Yaaraak Alemeththaiyum, Asmaaveththaiyum, Simriyaiyum Petraan; Simri Mosaavaip Petraan.
43 mosaa Piniyaavaip Petraan; Ivan Kumaaran Rappaayaa; Ivan Kumaaran Eliyaasaa; Ivan Kumaaran Aadhsel.
44 aadhselukku Aaru Kumaarar Irundhaargal; Avargal Naamangalaavana, Areekkaam, Pokkuru, Ismavel, Seraayaa, Opadhiyaa, Aanaan, Ivargal Aadhselin Kumaarar.
